(In reply to comment #1)
> What VM are you using?
> 

java version "1.5.0_08"
Java(TM) 2 Runtime Environment, Standard Edition (build 1.5.0_08-b03)
Java HotSpot(TM) Client VM (build 1.5.0_08-b03, mixed mode)

Closing as a dup of bug 140191.
Occurs on this line:
System.arraycopy(name, start, this.sourceName, 0, this.sourceName.length);

when the previous line is:
this.sourceName = new char[name.length - start];

name cannot be null and this.sourceName is initialized to be a char[].
So I really don't see how this can happen.


*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of bug 140191 ***
